author: NASS
description:
i colorized, restored and created a sound design for this video of Christchurch, New Zealand Early scenes (1900 - 1920?) . Includes "A Typical New Zealand Home

5:20 - 9:26 B&W Source Before And Aftre Restoration
Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.


B&W Video Source: Archives New Zealand Te Rua Mahara o te Kāwanatanga
B&W Video Source: https://digitalnz.org/records/20147176

title: Christchurch, New Zealand 1900s in Color [60fps, Remastered] w/sound design added
